sentences.en: A securities company may not canvass any securities underwriting business by any unjust competition means.
sentences.cn: 证券公司不得以不正当竞争手段招揽证券承销业务.

sentences.en: Cabinet ministers had been asked to canvass opinion from their junior assistants.
sentences.cn: 要求内阁部长调查他们年轻助理们的意见.

sentences.en: Candidates from all three parties were out canvassing in Darlington today.
sentences.cn: 三个政党的候选人今天都在达灵顿拉选票。

sentences.en: During a canvass of the neighborhood we collected 200 dollars for the school.
sentences.cn: 在邻近地区的一次募捐,我们为学校募得了二百美元.

sentences.en: During canvass of the neighborhood we collected 200 dollars for the school.
sentences.cn: 在邻近“地区”“的”一次募捐,我们为学校募得了二百美元.

sentences.en: Each mayoral candidate sent people to canvass various areas of the city.
sentences.cn: 每位市长候选人都派出人马到市内各地游说拉票.

sentences.en: He visited Spain to canvass Spanish opinion.
sentences.cn: 他访问西班牙以徵求西班牙的意见.

sentences.en: I wil canvass the floors before I start painting the walls.
sentences.cn: 开始粉刷墙壁之前,我会详细检查地板.

sentences.en: I'm canvassing for the Republican Party.
Immediately after this meeting I began my canvass of friends and colleagues.
sentences.cn: 在这次会见之后,我立即开始征求我的朋友和同事们的意见.

sentences.en: No candidate shall circularise or canvass in writing other Members in respect of any such election.
sentences.cn: 任何候选人不应以书面形式,就选举之事向其他会员宣传或游说.

sentences.en: Our next move was the canvass, and with a distinct woman's platform we took the field.
sentences.cn: 我们下一步就是去拉票, 把我们独特的妇女政纲带到民间.

sentences.en: The barber was tinkling the metal to canvass for business.
sentences.cn: 理发师在胡同中敲着唤头招揽生意.

sentences.en: The US has been canvassing support from other Asian states.
sentences.cn: 美国一直游说其他亚洲国家，寻求支持。

sentences.en: To question in a survey; canvass.
sentences.cn: 在调查中询问; ''.'民意测验'.''.

sentences.en: We have well - established channels of distribution and we canvass the retailers direct, without any middleman.
sentences.cn: 我方有良好的销售渠道, 不通过中间商而直接向零售商推销.

sentences.en: Will you please canvass your market ( buyers , customers , clients ) for orders.
sentences.cn: 请向贵方市场 ( 买主, 客户 ) 兜揽定货.

sentences.en: Your life is like a canvass where your activities are recorded.
sentences.cn: 你的生命像是一场竞选,你的行动是被记录的.

trans.tran_cn: 细究；彻底检查；向…拉票或拉生意
trans.tran_en: If you canvass for a particular person or political party, you go around an area trying to persuade people to vote for that person or party

trans.tran_cn: （在政治方面）游说，调查意见，为讨论而提出（意见等），详细检查
